name: Minesweeper Neo
description:
Minesweeper Neo is a modern interpretation of a classic Windows puzzle game. No distractions or spin off modes, just you, an empty board with hidden mines and your intuition...and a bit of luck at the start!

Compete with your friends to see who can find the most amount of mines in the shortest space of time both locally and online on a global leader-board. Alternatively take your time to hone your mine finding skills by going past 'Hard' mode and setting your own map size and mine count.

And the best thing is...totally FREE! No payments or ADs just the game. (I mean you can donate a little something for coffee IF you enjoy the things I make and want to see more!)

Controls:

  • Mouse ,
  • Controller (XBox One Tested)
  • Touch

Features:

  • 3 preset difficulty modes + a custom difficulty mode
  • Musical scales Easter egg
  • Colour blind filters (untested, feedback appreciated)
  • Local & Global Leaderboards (Social service dependant)

Coming Soon:

  • Mac App Store with Game Center Integration
  • Android with Google Play Games Integration
  • iOS with Game Center Integration
